goal:
开发一个简单的计算器程序，要求：
    1. 实现加减乘除四个基本运算
    2. 编写完整的单元测试
    3. 运行测试，确保测试通过
    4. 文件保存在calculator.py

rules.name: Initialize Project Structure
rules.action: Create a new directory for the project and initialize a new Python file named calculator.py
rules.expected_outcome: Project directory and calculator.py file created

rules.name: Implement Basic Operations
rules.condition: calculator.py file exists and is empty
rules.action: Implement add, subtract, multiply, and divide functions in calculator.py

rules.name: Write Unit Tests
rules.action: Write unit tests for each operation in a new file named test_calculator.py
rules.expected_outcome: Unit tests for all operations written in test_calculator.py

rules.name: Run Unit Tests
rules.action: Execute the unit tests to ensure all operations work as expected

rules.name: Finalize Project
rules.action: Review code and tests, make any necessary adjustments, and finalize the project
rules.expected_outcome: Project completed and ready for use
